half life es de los mejores juegos que he jugado y una de las poca sagas que realmente disfruto rejugar, asi sepa los dialogos o que va a pasar despu√©s, seria genial que se animen a lanzar Half Life 3
I like this game. Good game. Fun to play. I play it two times. I don't play it three times. What is three? Three does not exist.
Sigue bien con la trama, muy buena la batalla final. Espero la parte 3 (?

You know I was really hoping something would go wrong and they would kill Alyx at the beginning so I wouldn't have to babysit her sorry ass but, of course not, Valve doesn't have the balls to do that, do they? I don't like anything to do with Half Life 2 because instead of letting me do something game makes me wait anywhere from 30 seconds to couple minutes so a character does something for me or finish their dialogue so I can move on and do something THEY asked me to do. It is insulting to the player's intelligence and I fail to see how unreasonable amount of people not only like these games but also think they have high replayabality value. For all intents and purposes this game has unskippable "cutscenes", just because an actual cutscene doesn't play when characters enter dialogue doesn't make it any less annoying.
